title: Rural Exports

speaker: Boys' Club No. 14 In Aid Of The Parramatta Police Mr Holding
theText: The answer to the honourable
title: Rural Exports

speaker: Commonwealth In June Last As Being More Than $10 Mr Hurford
theText: The answer to the honourableA recent survey indicated 95 per cent of working holidaymakers entering Australia are single, they travel extensively and mostly work in service occupations as cleaners, hotel/motel staff, waiters etc. To offer this facility to couples or persons with young children would be to change the fundamental nature of the Scheme.
title: Rural Exports
